amendment.description: An amendment numbered 41 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit performance awards or bonuses for senior executive service employees at the Internal Revenue Service (IRS).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
